channel.title: Please help with connection
channel.description: alright well i got my server the way i want it and everythings good except....i can log on but no one else can, i have the server running and no-ip up with my server ip checked, moparscape is up and i have port fowarding (i think), please help what do i need to do? i think i have port fowarding up i went to my ip adress in the adress bar and loged in and made a port fowarding...in the tutorial it said to name it after ur server which mine is battlefield...so i put battlefield as service name and then 43594 as port and i put my ip adress to my computer. but it still doesnt work...it shows port fowarding and allows me to click ok but no one can log on my server...i had a feeling i needed to put my noip ip in it but i tryed and didnt work...do i need to put moparscape instead of my server name? what do i need to do? or is my port fowarding fine and is it something else? what i really need is a step by step maybe with pics tutorial on how to get ur server to where people can join... please help me out here im in desperate needs...i know how to java code and all that stuff so i dont need help with my server script just help with letting people join my server...thanks

item.title: Please help with connection
item.dc:creator: @old_nite old_nite
item.description:
@old_nite wrote:

yeh but i really wuld rather have it on no-ip becuz hamachi just doesnt have as many people on it[br][size=1]Posted on: May 19, 2007, 01:14:14 PM[/size][hr]please help help is still needed

Read full topic

item.title: Please help with connection
item.dc:creator: @Owned_Irl1 Owned Irl
item.description:
@Owned_Irl1 wrote:

i had the same problem… i would say… shut off your windows firewall…

make sure in your firewalls… moparscape isnt blocked… or something…

hamachi, honestly is a lot easier to handle… and thats the route i took…

the windows firewall fix, fixed my problem

Read full topic

item.description:
@old_nite wrote:

alright well i got my server the way i want it and everythings good except…i can log on but no one else can, i have the server running and no-ip up with my server ip checked, moparscape is up and i have port fowarding (i think), please help what do i need to do? i think i have port fowarding up i went to my ip adress in the adress bar and loged in and made a port fowarding…in the tutorial it said to name it after ur server which mine is battlefield…so i put battlefield as service name and then 43594 as port and i put my ip adress to my computer. but it still doesnt work…it shows port fowarding and allows me to click ok but no one can log on my server…i had a feeling i needed to put my noip ip in it but i tryed and didnt work…do i need to put moparscape instead of my server name? what do i need to do? or is my port fowarding fine and is it something else? what i really need is a step by step maybe with pics tutorial on how to get ur server to where people can join… please help me out here im in desperate needs…i know how to java code and all that stuff so i dont need help with my server script just help with letting people join my server…thanks
